title: League of Legend Skill survery

embed.description: Create a new survey on your own or with others at the same time. Choose from a variety of survey types and analyze results in Google Forms. Free from Google.

body:
Hello everyone,

For my school assessed work I had to make a survey and I decided to base it on League.
I was just wondering if anyone could possibly fill this out and help a dire student in need.
Just related to skill of League players.

Consent Form:
You are invited to take part in a research survey. The focus of this survey is about finding out the skill of players in League of Legends. Your participation will require less than 5 minutes and is completed online with radio buttons and short answer. This survey will be strictly confidential and files will be stored in a personal drive being recorded in a computer file. This research will be made public and will not include your name or any other personal details. If you have any questions please ask below.

Survey Link: http://goo.gl/forms/DHxdCvOt9c

Thank you.

replies.body: Hope this helps you out! I was looking through the previous response graphs and saw that the largest % of people who took this survey play support. That just goes to show how support players are kind and helpful, because I really really doubt that most people who play this game actually willing play support. Maybe something interesting to talk about after this has finished? anyway good luck!
